hanzi-su-wiki:
記

Значения

Писать, записывать, делать пометки; хроника, запись; память

Мнемоника

  • Запоминать речь 言 для себя 己. С появлением письма стало возможным делать заметки для памяти.

  • "Я записал всё, что вы сказали."

Варианты

记
purpleculture_pinyin:
jì
to record; to note; to memorize; to remember; mark; sign; classifier for blows, kicks, shots
записать; отметить; запоминать; помнить; отметка; знак; классификатор на удары руками, ногами, выстрелами

記記RS
X		chronicle, write down
  • words 言 on a scroll like threads woven 己 into a roll of cloth
書 著 紀 録 誌

记记		record, scribe, keep in mind, remember
  • woven 己 words 言 (either into the fabric of scrolls or in the fabric of the mind)
  • remembering is talking 言 to yourself 己

heisig_chinese_memo: A scribe writes down the words spoken by a snake (i.e. a lawyer) so everyone can remember.
heisig_constituent: scribe, say, words, keitai, mouth, snake, self
koohiiStory1: A scribe writes down the words spoken by a snake (i.e. a lawyer).
koohiiStory2: Snakes have no hands. So, when a snake needs to write down something, it has to call in a SCRIBE, who will write down all the sayings of the snake.

WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: What you say to oneself (yourself), you decide to write down. Whether this is in the form of a journal, diary, or blog, you feel the need to record these important thoughts in some way.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info:
Just imagine writing in a diary and saying everything to write aloud to yourself in your head.
"Dear me, today I learned a lot of new kanji on WaniKani. It was the best. I love the crabigator sooooo much. Love, me."
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You need to protect what you write down and record for yourself with a key (き). These are your special thoughts and feelings, you don't want anyone else to see! Lock them away with a key!
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Picture the key you use to keep what you write down a secret. What does it look like? How does it feel in your hands?
Ru_Notes: Фонетик: 己 (おのれ、つちのと、コ、キ сам; шестой циклический знак). Не путать: 紀 (キ эра, хроника).

Ru_trainchinese:
jì: (глаг/сущ) помнить; отмечать, записывать; родинка, родимое пятно
jì: (графема/сч.слово) записи, заметки; (счетное слово для действий) один, одна (удар, пощечина и т.д.)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: words (言) to yourself (己) = a note
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: To remember things I just say the same words to myself over and over.  Oh wait, not I don't.  I use mnemonics!
humanum_full_description_en:
Bronze inscriptions start with " speech " and " ji " sound, pass falsely as " period ", Shangpang Fuyan: "eyebrow life is not remembered (period)", which means the endless period of longevity.

" Record " often means record. "Shuowen": "Remember, sparse. From the voice of the self." Duan Yucai changed to "Remember, 疋也." Note: "Zu, the current word is sparse, which means that the division of sparseness and knowledge." Zuo Zhuan‧ Seven Years of the Public”: "The meeting of husbands and princes, its morals, penal etiquette, no country does not remember, remember the position of traitor, the emperor league will take the place of it. If you do not remember, it is not Shengde."

"Keeping in mind " also means not forgetting and keeping the impression in your head. "Shu‧Yiji": "Tart to remember it." Kong Chuan: "If the tart is not, remember the fault."

" Remember " can be expressed classics. "Selected Works-Bao Zhao "Ascension to Heaven"": "Five pictures are issued with a note of gold, and the Nine Yi Yin Dan Sutra."

" Ke " also means a sign. "Selected Works‧ Sima Xiangru"Feng Chan Wen": "If you say it, it is Taishan Miji, and Liang's father is not a few." Li Shan quoted "Han Shu Yinyi": "On Mount Tai, there is nothing to express, Liang The father’s mandala has nothing to do with it."

" Ji " also refers to the text that describes or interprets the rule system, such as "The Book of Rites", and can also refer to a style that focuses on narrative and also discusses lyricism and the description of mountains and rivers, such as "Peach Blossom Spring".
humanum_short_description_en: Bronze inscriptions start with " speak " and " ji " sound, and pass false as " period " " Record " often means record.
humanum_full_description:
金文從「言」，「己」聲，通假作「期」，上鄀府簠：「眉壽無記(期)」，表示長壽無盡期。

　　「記」後常表示記錄。《說文》：「記，疏也。从言己聲。」段玉裁改為「記，疋也。」注云：「疋，今字作疏，謂分疏而識之也。」《左傳‧僖公七年》：「夫諸侯之會，其德刑禮儀，無國不記，記姦之位，君盟替矣。作而不記，非盛德也。」

　　「記」也表示不忘，把印象保持在腦中。《書‧益稷》：「撻以記之。」孔傳：「笞撻不是者，使記識其過。」

　　「記」可表示典籍。《文選‧鮑照〈升天行〉》：「五圖發金記，九籥隱丹經。」

　　「記」還表示標志。《文選‧司馬相如〈封禪文〉》：「若然辭之，是泰山靡記，而梁父罔幾也。」李善注引《漢書音義》：「泰山之上，無所表記，梁父壇場，無所庶幾。」

　　「記」亦表示記述或解釋典章制度的文字，如《禮記》，也可表示以敘事為主，兼及議論抒情和山川景觀的描寫的文體，如〈桃花源記〉。
humanum_short_description: 金文從「言」，「己」聲，通假作「期」。「記」後常表示記錄。

①把印象保持在腦子裏：記憶。記取。記性。博聞強記。
②把事物寫下來：記錄。記功。記者。
③記載事物的書冊或文字：遊記。日記。大事記。
④符號，標識：印記。標記。記號。
⑤古時的一種公文：奏記。箋記。
⑥皮膚上的生下來就有的深色斑：胎記。
⑦量詞，指打一下：給他一記耳光。

金文從「 言 」，「 己 」聲，通假作「 期 」，上鄀府簠：「眉壽無記(期)」，表示長壽無盡期。 「 記 」後常表示記錄。《說文》：「記，疏也。从言己聲。」段玉裁改為「記，疋也。」注云：「疋，今字作疏，謂分疏而識之也。」《左傳‧僖公七年》：「夫諸侯之會，其德刑禮儀，無國不記，記姦之位，君盟替矣。作而不記，非盛德也。」 「 記 」也表示不忘，把印象保持在腦中。《書‧益稷》：「撻以記之。」孔傳：「笞撻不是者，使記識其過。」 「 記 」可表示典籍。《文選‧鮑照〈升天行〉》：「五圖發金記，九籥隱丹經。」 「 記 」還表示標志。《文選‧司馬相如〈封禪文〉》：「若然辭之，是泰山靡記，而梁父罔幾也。」李善注引《漢書音義》：「泰山之上，無所表記，梁父壇場，無所庶幾。」 「 記 」亦表示記述或解釋典章制度的文字，如《禮記》，也可表示以敘事為主，兼及議論抒情和山川景觀的描寫的文體，如〈桃花源記〉。
Bronze inscriptions start with " speech" and " ji" sound, pass falsely as " period", Shangpang Fuyan: "eyebrow life is not remembered (period)", which means the endless period of longevity. " Record" often means record. "Shuowen": "Remember, sparse. From the voice of the self." Duan Yucai changed to "Remember, 疋也." Note: "Zu, the current word is sparse, which means that the division of sparseness and knowledge." Zuo Zhuan‧ Seven Years of the Public”: "The meeting of husbands and princes, its morals, penal etiquette, no country does not remember, remember the position of traitor, the emperor league will take the place of it. If you do not remember, it is not Shengde." "Keeping in mind" also means not forgetting and keeping the impression in your head. "Shu‧Yiji": "Tart to remember it." Kong Chuan: "If the tart is not, remember the fault." " Remember" can be expressed classics. "Selected Works-Bao Zhao "Ascension to Heaven"": "Five pictures are issued with a note of gold, and the Nine Yi Yin Dan Sutra." " Ke" also means a sign. "Selected Works‧ Sima Xiangru"Feng Chan Wen": "If you say it, it is Taishan Miji, and Liang's father is not a few." Li Shan quoted "Han Shu Yinyi": "On Mount Tai, there is nothing to express, Liang The father’s mandala has nothing to do with it." " Ji" also refers to the text that describes or interprets the rule system, such as "The Book of Rites", and can also refer to a style that focuses on narrative and also discusses lyricism and the description of mountains and rivers, such as "Peach Blossom Spring".

記字的基本解释

記
jì
见“记”。

記字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jì］
［《廣韻》居吏切，去志，見。］
“记1”的繁体字。
(1)不忘，把印象保持在脑中。
(2)记录；载录。
(3)公牍；札子。
(4)指典籍；著作。
(5)文体名。以叙事为主，兼及议论抒情和山川景观的描写。晋陶潜有《桃花源記》。
(6)记述或解释典章制度的文字。如《周礼·考工记》、《礼记》、《大戴礼记》。
(7)印章；钤记。
(8)表记；标志。
(9)皮肤上生来就有的深色的斑。
(10)动量词。打一下叫打一记。
(11)佛教语。佛对弟子和发愿心修行的人，预言其将来成果作佛的事叫“記”。以之授与其人叫“授記”，受者谨领叫“受記”。
(12)通“其”。语助词。
(13)通“計”。参见“記會”。

記字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【言字部】　記； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页1149第02
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】?居吏切，音冀。【說文】疏也。【徐曰】謂一一分別記之也。【博雅】識也。【釋名】紀也。【玉篇】錄也。【廣韻】志也。【書·益稷】撻以記之。【傳】使記識其過也。【禮·王制】太史典禮執?記。【註】國有禮事，則豫執?策，記載所當行之禮儀。【唐書·于志寧傳】左有記言之史，右有記事之官。【關尹子·五鑑篇】昔遊再到，記憶宛然。　又【博雅】書也。【前漢·蕭望之傳】待詔鄭朋奏記于蕭望之。【註】記，書也。奏記自朋始。【文心雕龍】後漢始有公府奏記，記之言志，進己志也。　又【正字通】文符也。【後漢·鍾離意傳】少爲郡督郵，時部縣亭長有受人酒禮者，府下記案考之，意封還記，太守甚賢之。　又官名。【後漢·百官志】記室令史，主上表章報書記。　又與其通。【字彙補】助語辭。【詩·王風】彼其之子。【箋】其或作記。或作己。讀聲相似。　又叶苟起切，音几。【崔琰·述初賦】望高密以亟征，戾衡門而造止。覿游夏之峩峩，聽大猷之篇記。一說本作紀，紀與止叶，譌作記。

記字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

記字的起名意思

暂无。

Remember
Basic explanation of words
Remember
jì
See "Remember".
Remember
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jì］
["Guangyun" local officials cut, go to record, see. ]
Traditional characters of "记1".
(1) Don't forget, keep the impression in your mind.
(2) Record; record.
(3) Gongju; Zhazi.
(4) Refers to classics; works.
(5) The name of the style. Mainly narrative, but also discusses lyricism and the description of mountains and rivers. Jin Taoqian has "The Story of Peach Blossom Spring".
(6) The words describing or explaining the system of codes. Such as "Zhou Li·Kao Gong Ji", "Book of Rites", "Dai Dai Li Ji".
(7) Seal; seal.
(8) Table mark; mark.
(9) Dark spots that are born on the skin.
(10) Verbal quantifiers. Make a call to make a call.
(11) Buddhist language. The Buddha's prophecy of his disciples and those who wish to practice in the future is called "remembering". It is called "Shouji" to give and others, and the recipient is called "Shouji".
(12) Link "其". Auxiliary words.
(13) Through "counter". See "Remembering Meeting".
Remember
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 1] [Words Department] 　 Ji; Kangxi Strokes: 10; Page Number: Page 1149 No. 02
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? The local officials cut, the sound is Ji. [Said the text] Shu also. [Xu Yue] It is said that one by one is recorded separately. 【Bo Ya】Knowledge. [Release name] Ji also. 【Jade articles】Also recorded. [Guang Yun] Zhi Ye. 【Book·Yiji】Tart to remember. [Biography] To remember its past. 【Ritual·Royal System】Executive Record of Taishi Ceremony. Remember
Name meaning
Nothing.
jì
вм. 记

記

Значения

Писать, записывать, делать пометки; хроника, запись; память

Мнемоника

  • Запоминать речь 言 для себя 己. С появлением письма стало возможным делать заметки для памяти.

  • "Я записал всё, что вы сказали."

Варианты

记

Radicals: 言, 己  (say, oneself)
Meaning Mnemonic
What you say to oneself (yourself), you decide to write down. Whether this is in the form of a journal, diary, or blog, you feel the need to record these important thoughts in some way.
Just imagine writing in a diary and saying everything to write aloud to yourself in your head.
"Dear me, today I learned a lot of new kanji on WaniKani. It was the best. I love the crabigator sooooo much. Love, me."
Reading Mnemonic
You need to protect what you write down and record for yourself with a key (き). These are your special thoughts and feelings, you don't want anyone else to see! Lock them away with a key!
Picture the key you use to keep what you write down a secret. What does it look like? How does it feel in your hands?
